title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 447.9 - Approved respite care and services provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 447.9 - Approved respite care and services provider

State Regulations

Agency boarding homes may be approved as approved respite
care and services providers pursuant to Part 435 of this Title and when so
approved are subject to the applicable requirements of such

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
447.9

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
